For stayed hands are antinomic to the Little Revenger, the dagger which strikes back so fast as to be unseen.

And sometimes it can be so sudden and violent as to become a devastating glacial onslaught which turns the world into a frozen wasteland in the blink of an eye. In these rare moments, autumn's symbols can freeze to the core and be encased in permanent ice, their fragile shells turning into improbable recipients for tremendous wintry powers.

GameItemType.Description: This safety helmet must have belonged to a pre-Cataclysm engineer who worked in dangerous environments filled with elemental hazards. It appears to be in fairly good shape. You're now all set for a dig in some scalding volcanic mine.

When the subterfuge was discovered, Lester, now designated as the Cheater, became the target of a cartload of rotten tomatoes.

GameItemType.Description: The contents of this letter describe in great lifelike details the success of an intricate heroic quest. It's so captivating you feel as if you could have been a participant. And the strangest thing is that all of protagonists' names have been mysteriously erased. You only need to fill in the blanks and claim for yourself the glory of these anonymous champions.

GameModifier.Provides: Being generous is easy when you have a lot to give back. Maybe this maxim is preposterous when applied to a lightning struck branch but don't knock down heartfelt attempts to elevate the debate.

GameModifier.Provides: The blue solution caught inside this vial is rippling with energy and actively sloshing against its glassy prison. It's almost as if it would break out and found its own liquid kingdom.

GameItemType.Description:
------------------------------------------------ !WARNING! Do not "Use" on loot pop-up. ------------------------------------------------
Ah the legendary Lost Barrowhill Wine! Its vines are said to grow on the burial grounds of the Arcane War casualties, charged with the wild magic of a thousand sleeping Archmages. You could get a lot more than a hangover from ingesting this heady liquor. Plus there's always a gold coin to be found at the bottom of the jug.

Ingesting it will develop that latent physical and mental potential and push it to the surface. Drink without moderation and amplify it all.

Not compatible with any form of elegance.
